Subject: RSO UAE - STORE Re-Opening - SWAROVSKI - Mall of the Emirates 
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a Re-Opening of Store “SWAROVSKI Boutique at Mall of the Emirates” the opening date is on Tuesday 22nd Oct 2024.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

 

Best Regards,

Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE RENOVATION - SWAROVSKI - Mall of the Emirates 
Importance: High

 

Project Update

 

Dear Team,

Kindly be informed that for renovation plan of SWAROVSKI - Mall of the Emirates - Boutique the location will be temporary closed and last trading date is 01st Aug 2024, Handover to Mall on 04th Aug 2024.

The boutique is expected to re-open for business on October 2024 (date TBC).

 

To ensure a smooth closure, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time.

 

*	Apply for Mall and Police permits (Merchandise, Non-Merchandise transfer (Store team and logistic) / IT Equipment, Traffic counter, and CCTV Dismantling) @Mohamed ABBAS <mailto:Mohamed.Abbas@chalhoub.com> 
*	IT Equipment dismantling on 04th Aug 7 AM by/ Service request please to be raised @Rizaldy <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  @Ali <mailto:Alizeb.Siyal@chalhoub.com> 

*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different one on 01st Aug at the EOD @Mohamed ABBAS <mailto:Mohamed.Abbas@chalhoub.com> 
*	Please arrange TG team to collect the Cash Deposit on 02nd Aug 2023 / Ensure freeze of the Cash Collection Service Agreement till Oct 2024 @Ghouse <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com> 
*	Please Arrange Sefa team to dismantle the NVR and CCTV on 04th Aug 7AM  @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Lorena <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>  @Pierre <mailto:Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com>  to Hold services on 04th Aug (cleaning – pest control) till opening.

Best Regards,

Subject: RSO UAE - STORE Re-Opening - SWAROVSKI - Mall of the Emirates 
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a Re-Opening of Store “SWAROVSKI Boutique at Mall of the Emirates” the opening date is on Tuesday 22nd Oct 2024.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

 

Best Regards,

 

RAMEZ ZEBDIE​​​​

Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE RENOVATION - SWAROVSKI - Mall of the Emirates 
Importance: High

 

Project Update

 

Dear Team,

Kindly be informed that for renovation plan of SWAROVSKI - Mall of the Emirates - Boutique the location will be temporary closed and last trading date is 01st Aug 2024, Handover to Mall on 04th Aug 2024.

The boutique is expected to re-open for business on October 2024 (date TBC).

 

To ensure a smooth closure, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time.

 

*	Apply for Mall and Police permits (Merchandise, Non-Merchandise transfer (Store team and logistic) / IT Equipment, Traffic counter, and CCTV Dismantling) @Mohamed ABBAS <mailto:Mohamed.Abbas@chalhoub.com> 
*	IT Equipment dismantling on 04th Aug 7 AM by/ Service request please to be raised @Rizaldy <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  @Ali <mailto:Alizeb.Siyal@chalhoub.com> 

*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different one on 01st Aug at the EOD @Mohamed ABBAS <mailto:Mohamed.Abbas@chalhoub.com> 
*	Please arrange TG team to collect the Cash Deposit on 02nd Aug 2023 / Ensure freeze of the Cash Collection Service Agreement till Oct 2024 @Ghouse <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com> 
*	Please Arrange Sefa team to dismantle the NVR and CCTV on 04th Aug 7AM  @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Lorena <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>  @Pierre <mailto:Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com>  to Hold services on 04th Aug (cleaning – pest control) till opening.

From: Ramez Zebdie <Ramez.Zebdie@chalhoub.com <mailto:Ramez.Zebdie@chalhoub.com> > 
Sent: Thursday, July 11, 2024 12:39 PM
Importance: High

 

Dear Team,

 

Hope you are doing well,

 

As per our minutes of meeting for renovation plan of SWAROVSKI - Mall of the Emirates, the location will be temporary closed and last trading date is 31st July 2024, Handover to Mall on 03rd Aug 2024.

The boutique is expected to re-open for business on October 2024 (date TBC).

 

To ensure a smooth closure, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time.

 

*	Apply for Mall and Police permits (Merchandise, Non-Merchandise transfer (Store team and logistic) / IT Equipment, Traffic counter, and CCTV Dismantling) @Mohamed ABBAS <mailto:Mohamed.Abbas@chalhoub.com> 
*	IT Equipment dismantling on 03rd Aug 7 AM by/ Service request please to be raised @Rizaldy <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  @Ali <mailto:Alizeb.Siyal@chalhoub.com>

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a Re-Opening of Store “SWAROVSKI Boutique at Mall of the Emirates”.

 

the handover from project team is on Friday 18th Oct, and the opening date is on Sunday 20th Oct 2024.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

 

Best Regards,

 

RAMEZ ZEBDIE​​​​
